code:
-spec min_operations(Nums :: [integer()]) -> integer().
min_operations(Nums) ->
    CountMap = lists:foldl(fun(X, Acc) -> maps:update_with(X, fun(C) -> C + 1 end, 1, Acc) end, #{}, Nums),
    {Result, _} = maps:fold(fun(_, V, {Ops, ThreeRem}) ->
                                ThreeOps = V div 3,
                                NewThreeRem = ThreeRem + (V rem 3),
                                NewOps = Ops + ThreeOps + (NewThreeRem div 3),
                                {NewOps, NewThreeRem rem 3}
                            end, {0, 0}, CountMap),
    TotalElems = lists:sum(maps:values(CountMap)),
    if
        TotalElems rem 2 == 0 -> Result;
        true -> -1
    end.
